```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(htmltools)
```

```{r}
thumbnail <- function(title, img, href, caption = TRUE) {
  div(class = "col-sm-4",
      a(class = "thumbnail", title = title, href = href,
        img(src = img),
        div(class = if (caption) "caption",
            if (caption) title)
      )
  )
}
```

```{r}
thumbnail("Rookie Researcher", "images/dg_flavicon-dom-logo-550x550-NoBackground.png",
          "https://github.com/dgrisafe/rookie-researcher#rookie-researcher")
```
